description: Stretch your outdoor limits as the weather cools with the Orsa Polartec® Wool 1/2-Zip Hoody. Stretchy performance wool meets casual, easygoing comfort with this all-new breathable hooded fleece built for picking up the pace on your go-to city Strava route or winding down by the campfire. Throw a shell overtop and pop your hood, and you'll be ready to trek through the trees and above the tree line on slippery wet scrambles and full sends in the snowy backcountry.
name: Marmot Orsa Polartec Wool Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® Wool 52% Wool, 40% Polyester, 8% Nylon Thermal
